basic.blooming: Flowering period in winter and spring
basic.color: Flower color scarlet, leaf color dark green

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, like moderate light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely；remove peduncle after flowering
